  1. Where did your likes go? Please Read This Thread »

Free Fight: Nick Diaz debut

Discussion in 'UFC Discussion' started by JohnMangala, Apr 22, 2020.

  1. JohnMangala Green Belt

    Joined:
    Sep 26, 2014
    Messages:
    1,318
    Likes Received:
    23


    Nick Diaz’s debut in the UFC against Jeremy Jackson. Good shit, I wish we could see Nick go one last time.
     
    JohnMangala, Apr 22, 2020
    #1

  2. Klaavical Black Belt

    Joined:
    Aug 31, 2002
    Messages:
    7,102
    Likes Received:
    23
    Location:
    B.C.
    Thanks Mang


    Holy crap just realized that Jackson dude is a major scumbag

    https://mmajunkie.usatoday.com/2011...jeremy-jackson-gets-25-years-to-life-sentence
     
    Klaavical, Apr 22, 2020
    #2

  3. Jackonfire BMF Mod Staff Member Senior Moderator

    Joined:
    Jun 14, 2009
    Messages:
    50,115
    Likes Received:
    973
    Location:
    The Mother Ship
    Absolute legend.
     
    Jackonfire, Apr 22, 2020
    #3

  4. Jopo Gold Belt

    Joined:
    Dec 18, 2001
    Messages:
    16,597
    Likes Received:
    15
    Location:
    Spinning backfist seminar in West Linn
    GSP should go learn to finish armbars from Nick after that Hardy fight.
     
    Jopo, Apr 22, 2020
    #4
